personality_traits.1: I idolize a particular hero of my faith, and constantly refer to that person's deeds and example.
personality_traits.2: I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working toward peace.
personality_traits.3: I see omens in every event and action. The gods try to speak to us, we just need to listen.
personality_traits.4: Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.
personality_traits.5: I quote (or misquote) sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation.
personality_traits.6: I am tolerant (or intolerant) of other faiths and respect (or condemn) the worship of other gods.
personality_traits.7: I've enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society among my temple's elite. Rough living grates on me.
personality_traits.8: I've spent so long in the temple that I have little practical experience dealing with people in the outside world.

ideals.1: Tradition. The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld. (Lawful)
ideals.2: Charity. I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost. (Good)
ideals.3: Change. We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world. (Chaotic)
ideals.4: Power. I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith's religious hierarchy. (Lawful)
ideals.5: Faith. I trust that my deity will guide my actions. I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well. (Lawful)
ideals.6: Aspiration. I seek to prove myself worthy of my god's favor by matching my actions against his or her teachings. (Any)

bonds.1: I would die to recover an ancient relic of my faith that was lost long ago.
bonds.2: I will someday get revenge on the corrupt temple hierarchy who branded me a heretic.
bonds.3: I owe my life to the priest who took me in when my parents died.
bonds.4: Everything I do is for the common people.
bonds.5: I will do anything to protect the temple where I served.
bonds.6: I seek to preserve a sacred text that my enemies consider heretical and seek to destroy.

flaws.1: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.
flaws.2: I put too much trust in those who wield power within my temple's hierarchy.
flaws.3: My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in my god.
flaws.4: I am inflexible in my thinking.
flaws.5: I am suspicious of strangers and expect the worst of them.
flaws.6: Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life.
